description: Amendments to planning permission dated 1st December 2021 (RN: 20/06105/FULL) for, 'Demolition of existing roof storeys and rebuilding to create a new sheer storey at fifth floor level and realigned tiered extensions at sixth, seventh and eighth floor level, plus roof top plant room. Erection of full height extension (ground to new eighth floor level) in rear enclosed lightwell. Creation of new terraces on all elevations at sixth, seventh, eighth and roof level. Use of ground floor unit (northern unit) for either retail or office use within Class E and use of the ground floor unit (southern unit) for either retail , restaurant or office use within Class E. Alterations at ground floor to bring the building line forward and align with column line, and including new shopfronts and entrances'; NAMELY, Amendments to plant screen height; Relocation of basement bin store location; Revised End of Trip facilities layout; Alterations to main entrance doors; Introduction of an additional sprinkler top up cabinet; Relocation of commercial unit doors; Alterations to shop front design; Alterations to terrace doors; Rearrangement of central core and stair location; Additional fire-fighting shaft; Sky-lobby extension; and Amendments to wording of Condition 14 and Condition 18 in line with updated drawings.
